28.ara-name: كتاب الطب عن رسول اللَّهِ صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Abu Masud Al-Ansari narrated:"The Messenger of Allah (S.A.W) prohibited the price of a dog,the earnings of a fornicator (from fornication), and the payment made to the fortune-teller

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي أَجْرِ الْكَاهِنِ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About The Wage Of The Fortune Teller
